-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Pretty print the standard output of default `Show` instances.
--   
@package nicify-lib
@version 1.0.1

module Text.Nicify
nicify :: String -> String
data X
XString :: String -> X
XCurly :: [X] -> X
XBrackets :: [X] -> X
XAnything :: String -> X
XSep :: X
parseX :: String -> [X]
printX :: [X] -> String
printX' :: String -> [X] -> String
instance Typeable X
instance Show X
instance Read X
instance Eq X
instance Data X
